  1. net.tvburger.jdl.model

Uses of Package
net.tvburger.jdl.model

Packages that use net.tvburger.jdl.model
Package
Description
net.tvburger.jdl.adaline
Provides the implementation of Bernard Widrow and Ted Hoff's ADALINE (1960)
net.tvburger.jdl.datasets
Package to obtain data sets to be used with estimation functions
net.tvburger.jdl.knn
Provides the implementation of k-Nearest Neighbors
net.tvburger.jdl.mlp
Implementation of the MultiLayer Perceptron [WIP]
net.tvburger.jdl.model
Defines the concepts for estimation functions
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn
Defines the neural network as specialization of an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.optimizers
Contains the neural network optimizer algorithms
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training
Defines the concepts related for training an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes
Provides the different regimes for training
net.tvburger.jdl.perceptron
Provides the implementation of Frank Rosenblatt's Perceptron (1958)
  • Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.model used by net.tvburger.jdl.adaline
    Class
    Description
    DataSet.Sample
    The sample represents a single input for an estimation function and the corresponding expected outputs.
    EstimationFunction
    The EstimationFunction.estimate(float[]) method defines the contract for mapping input values to output values according to a specific estimation algorithm.
  • Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.model used by net.tvburger.jdl.datasets
    Class
    Description
    DataSet
    Represents a data set.
    DataSet.Loader
    Interface to load a data set.
